name: Baldi's Basics the end of evil!
name_original: Baldi's Basics the end of evil!
description:
Well the sequal is here. sorry if the end looked rushed. it's just that since porky powers didn't have time, I had to do the cringe voice acting. So enjoy.

Credits:

porky powers for voicing Baldi.

Splinta dinta for the Baldi model

super inky for the bully and first prize model.

Wowzaboimodder for the student model.
